LABEL: 0x2D1
STRING: 「Aaah!」

LABEL: 0x2EE
STRING: The theater room was illuminated by white lighting at Yukari's signal.

LABEL: 0x32E
STRING: Touri fell down in the middle of the now-bright space.

LABEL: 0x368
STRING: Seeing her acting so out of the ordinary, Yukari went quiet and supported her.

LABEL: 0x481
STRING: 「Please calm down, Touri-san!」

LABEL: 0x51B
STRING: 「...Is Reiri-chan not with you?」

LABEL: 0x581
STRING: Tokiwa cut in abruptly.

LABEL: 0x5A3
STRING: She didn't care about Touri's condition and asked because she wanted an answer.

LABEL: 0x5F3
STRING: It was beyond what you would call doing things at one's pace.

LABEL: 0x62D
STRING: But, it was true that I was curious about the fact that Reiri wasn't with her...

LABEL: 0x665
STRING: She closed in on Touri with a sulky look on her face, like a spoiled child.

LABEL: 0x6FD
STRING: 「Reiri-chan.」

LABEL: 0x77F
STRING: 「My beloved Reiri-chan didn't come with you?」

LABEL: 0x806
STRING: Touri's tension returned to normal thanks to how unconcerned Tokiwa was acting.

LABEL: 0x8C0
STRING: 「Yeah... She's in a room downstairs, but...」

LABEL: 0x957
STRING: 「Sorry, Tokiwa-chan...」

LABEL: 0xA33
STRING: 「――Wait!」

LABEL: 0xA54
STRING: 「Never mind that!」

LABEL: 0xA76
STRING: 「Hey!」

LABEL: 0xA8E
STRING: 「There was something outside the window!」

LABEL: 0xAD9
STRING: Outside the window... In other words, in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0xB05
STRING: If there was anything there, it was the deep-sea creatures.

LABEL: 0xB2F
STRING: Although we hadn't been particularly concerned about it so far, there must have been times when deep-sea fish passed right next to the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xB9E
STRING: And while I was exploring the deep sea, I had encountered a giant shark.

LABEL: 0xBE4
STRING: So, saying that there was "something" out there...

LABEL: 0xC12
STRING: Contrary to Touri's agitation, the theater room's reaction was mild.

LABEL: 0xD23
STRING: 「Some...thing?」

LABEL: 0xD45
STRING: 「And what would that be?」

LABEL: 0xDAB
STRING: 「Could you tell us what happened, step by step?」

LABEL: 0xDE9
STRING: 「How you saw this "something?"」

LABEL: 0xE7F
STRING: 「Yeah... Sure.」

LABEL: 0xEE3
STRING: She nodded and let out a sigh.

LABEL: 0xF19
STRING: Little by little, she seemed to calm down as she began her explanation.

LABEL: 0xFC1
STRING: 「Um, after I left with Reiri from the wheelhouse...」

LABEL: 0xFF3
STRING: 「We went to the lobby on the first floor.」

LABEL: 0x108C
STRING: 「She said she wanted to talk with me alone, but Reiri wouldn't tell me anything...」

LABEL: 0x10DB
STRING: 「While all that was happening, I heard a sound outside the ship.」

LABEL: 0x1128
STRING: 「A sound?」

LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: I suddenly asked her again.

LABEL: 0x11BB
STRING: Touri nodded her head.

LABEL: 0x11D7
STRING: Sounds that could be heard in the deep sea were very few.

LABEL: 0x1219
STRING: If she told us about the sound she heard, we might be able to learn something.

LABEL: 0x1263
STRING: 「What kind of sound was it...?」

LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: 「I didn't hear it very clearly, but I thought I heard something.」

LABEL: 0x1341
STRING: 「So, when you ask me what kind of sound it was, it's kind of hard to say...」

LABEL: 0x1377
STRING: 「Reiri asked if I'd misheard, but I couldn't help but be curious.」

LABEL: 0x13CF
STRING: 「So... I felt bad, but I went into a nearby room and looked out the window.」

LABEL: 0x1423
STRING: 「――And there it was.」

LABEL: 0x144E
STRING: 「Oh-ho-ho...」

LABEL: 0x1493
STRING: Tokiwa, who was trembling next to me, finally reached her limit.

LABEL: 0x15A8
STRING: 「Was it a Sloane's viperfish?!」

LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: 「Or a giant oarfish?!」

LABEL: 0x1710
STRING: 「Or the jackpot, a crestfish?!」

LABEL: 0x1747
STRING: She quickly listed the names of deep-sea fish, but the only one I had heard of was the oarfish.

LABEL: 0x17A5
STRING: I knew nothing about their appearance, but I was sure they looked incomprehensible.

LABEL: 0x1807
STRING: Touri answered her question with a hint of reluctance in her voice.

LABEL: 0x1936
STRING: 「I don't know the name, but...」

LABEL: 0x19C1
STRING: 「It looked like some kind of big shark...」

LABEL: 0x19F5
STRING: 「It was black and a bit glossy...」

LABEL: 0x1A36
STRING: 「A deep-sea shark, was it?」

LABEL: 0x1A56
STRING: 「We've narrowed the options down considerably... Uhuhu...」

LABEL: 0x1A8D
STRING: Tokiwa smiled eerily as she moved her fingers bewitchingly.

LABEL: 0x1ACD
STRING: But even if we could figure out the fish Touri had seen using Tokiwa's knowledge, it wouldn't solve anything.

LABEL: 0x1B2B
STRING: 「Touri, wasn't that just a shark?」

LABEL: 0x1B5D
STRING: 「Did you run all the way here because you were scared?」

LABEL: 0x1C80
STRING: 「That's right!」

LABEL: 0x1CF5
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x1D7B
STRING: When she tried to get to the heart of the matter, Touri lowered her head and stammered.

LABEL: 0x1DB7
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x1DCB
STRING: What did she see...?

LABEL: 0x1DF1
STRING: Was it something so scary she couldn't say it here...?

LABEL: 0x1E74
STRING: 「――Was it a person?」

LABEL: 0x1E9F
STRING: Hiragino made an abrupt suggestion.

LABEL: 0x1EB9
STRING: I could hear him chewing on a tablet.

LABEL: 0x1FB8
STRING: 「A person...? Surely not.」

LABEL: 0x1FDA
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei, this is the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x2015
STRING: 「I don't mean that they were alive.」

LABEL: 0x20A2
STRING: 「Touri-kun... could you tell me?」

LABEL: 0x20DD
STRING: His gentle eyes... The glint in his eyes seemed to envelop Touri.

LABEL: 0x2117
STRING: He didn't look away from her for a moment.

LABEL: 0x2153
STRING: Touri raised her head for a moment to look at him to make sure and, little by little, began talking.

LABEL: 0x224F
STRING: 「The shark... in its mouth...」

LABEL: 0x2271
STRING: 「I feel like it was holding something in its mouth.」

LABEL: 0x22B4
STRING: 「Something, huh?」

LABEL: 0x22DD
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x22F7
STRING: 「I couldn't see it clearly, though.」

LABEL: 0x2329
STRING: 「I didn't get a good look at it at all.」

LABEL: 0x235B
STRING: 「Maybe...」

LABEL: 0x237D
STRING: 「It wasn't a person――」

LABEL: 0x23C0
STRING: ――A person.

LABEL: 0x23D6
STRING: The dozens of corpses of the people who'd died on this ship.

LABEL: 0x2407
STRING: Of course, the rear section was still there.

LABEL: 0x243F
STRING: A repulsive space overflowing with corpses...

LABEL: 0x246F
STRING: But, for carnivorous deep-sea fish, it must be a welcome source of food.

LABEL: 0x24BD
STRING: The theater room fell silent after Touri's report.

LABEL: 0x2500
STRING: 「...It's no good, right?」

LABEL: 0x2527
STRING: In front of the four of us who were unable to say anything, it was Touri who spoke up again.

LABEL: 0x2571
STRING: The corners of her mouth lifted, and her stiff smile was like that of her twin sister.

LABEL: 0x2623
STRING: 「Just because they're dead...」

LABEL: 0x26A8
STRING: 「Doesn't mean they should be food for the fish...!」

LABEL: 0x273D
STRING: 「Hurry!」

LABEL: 0x2755
STRING: 「We have to do something for them!」

LABEL: 0x277D
STRING: 「Come on!」

LABEL: 0x27A4
STRING: 「H-Hey, Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x27CE
STRING: 「Please stay calm.」

LABEL: 0x2813
STRING: Touri was yelling hysterically.

LABEL: 0x2839
STRING: This discussion gave me a sense of deja vu.

LABEL: 0x285B
STRING: ――What was human dignity?

LABEL: 0x287D
STRING: ――What was the providence of life?

LABEL: 0x289F
STRING: When I turned around, Tokiwa was looking away as if she had no idea what we were talking about.

LABEL: 0x28E9
STRING: It seemed that she had no intention of restarting the debate that was never settled.

LABEL: 0x29F4
STRING: 「We have to do something!」

LABEL: 0x2A1D
STRING: 「Calm down, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x2A3D
STRING: 「Even if it was someone...」

LABEL: 0x2A6F
STRING: 「Even if we could recover the corpse...」

LABEL: 0x2A99
STRING: 「It's not like they would come back to life.」

LABEL: 0x2B01
STRING: ――I realized something as I said it.

LABEL: 0x2B84
STRING: Nee-san...

LABEL: 0x2B9E
STRING: Even if I learned the truth from seven years ago, she wouldn't come back.

LABEL: 0x2BF6
STRING: Even if I could pull up the truth that had sunk to the bottom of this dark sea,

LABEL: 0x2C40
STRING: my sister would not return.

LABEL: 0x2C64
STRING: If that was the case...

LABEL: 0x2C80
STRING: What was I supposed to do on this sunken ship?

LABEL: 0x2CCA
STRING: What should I know, and what should I do...?

LABEL: 0x2D64
STRING: 「Anyway, hurry up and come with me!」

LABEL: 0x2D8F
STRING: No one objected to Touri's words.

LABEL: 0x2E1A
STRING: Everyone looked to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2E53
STRING: 「...Understood.」

LABEL: 0x2ED2
STRING: 「Let's go, everyone.」

LABEL: 0x310E
STRING: 「...That's a pretty big group you have there.」

LABEL: 0x3141
STRING: As soon as Touri arrived at the room where she said she'd seen the deep-sea shark, Reiri greeted us with a blatantly disgusted expression.

LABEL: 0x31A1
STRING: She made no attempt to hide her aura of displeasure as she looked at us with an unreserved glare.

LABEL: 0x31EB
STRING: Anyone would flinch involuntarily at her rude attitude.

LABEL: 0x321B
STRING: In the end, it was her twin sister who shrank back the most.

LABEL: 0x326A
STRING: 「Were you looking out the window, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x329D
STRING: She called out to her, more afraid of her own sister than anything outside the window.

LABEL: 0x32FB
STRING: Reiri was taken aback by Touri's pitifully frightened look.

LABEL: 0x340C
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x3483
STRING: 「Yeah, I was looking.」

LABEL: 0x3511
STRING: 「How was it?!」

LABEL: 0x3531
STRING: 「Did that thing come back?!」

LABEL: 0x356A
STRING: 「No, there's been nothing.」

LABEL: 0x3600
STRING: 「...Really?」

LABEL: 0x362D
STRING: 「Yeah, really.」

LABEL: 0x364E
STRING: Reiri's expression didn't change in the slightest.

LABEL: 0x3676
STRING: She was so indifferent.

LABEL: 0x369E
STRING: Touri gave her a suspicious look.

LABEL: 0x36CC
STRING: Seeing that, Reiri sounded amused.

LABEL: 0x3768
STRING: 「You doubt me too, Touri?」

LABEL: 0x3802
STRING: 「Th-That's not it, but...」

LABEL: 0x3839
STRING: ...Touri "too."

LABEL: 0x3859
STRING: Only she believed in Reiri and never doubted her, no matter what...

LABEL: 0x3895
STRING: I was sure it wasn't something limited to here on the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x38E0
STRING: With that attitude of hers, there was no doubt that Reiri was isolated in many places.

LABEL: 0x3928
STRING: At times like that, I surmised that it was Touri's usual role to protect her in her place.

LABEL: 0x3986
STRING: Touri was somewhat discouraged but still continued her appeal.

LABEL: 0x3A38
STRING: 「...But it passed by here just earlier.」

LABEL: 0x3A6C
STRING: 「A big creature...」

LABEL: 0x3AA1
STRING: 「I didn't see it, though.」

LABEL: 0x3B24
STRING: 「Are you sure you're not just seeing things?」

LABEL: 0x3BBC
STRING: 「That's not it!」

LABEL: 0x3BD8
STRING: 「You might be right most of the time, but I know I saw it!」

LABEL: 0x3C8C
STRING: 「And I'm saying that I don't trust you.」

LABEL: 0x3CC0
STRING: 「Human vision is an arbitrary thing.」

LABEL: 0x3CEC
STRING: 「I don't trust your eyes, much less anyone else's.」

LABEL: 0x3DC5
STRING: What a sisterly quarrel.

LABEL: 0x3DE9
STRING: Touri (the older sister) was throwing a tantrum, and Reiri (the younger sister) dismissed her without even looking in her direction.

LABEL: 0x3E3D
STRING: An absolute balance of power...

LABEL: 0x3E5D
STRING: However, Touri may be the only one who could take on Reiri without backing up.

LABEL: 0x3EB1
STRING: Neither of them showed any sign of breaking.

LABEL: 0x3F15
STRING: But still...

LABEL: 0x3F33
STRING: The story Yukari was telling earlier that was interrupted by Touri...

LABEL: 0x3F75
STRING: The incident seven years ago, where my sister and Yukari were involved...

LABEL: 0x3FAD
STRING: What had happened back then...?

LABEL: 0x3FD5
STRING: Knowing that now might not help us in the slightest.

LABEL: 0x4021
STRING: Still, it'd be more useful than looking into this deep-sea shark that Touri was going on about...

LABEL: 0x40BE
STRING: 「Touri.」

LABEL: 0x40D4
STRING: 「Even if you're not mistaken, the shark has already swum far away, hasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x41A2
STRING: 「But... I'm certain it had something in its mouth...」

LABEL: 0x41D6
STRING: 「Um, I couldn't see it clearly, but...」

LABEL: 0x4225
STRING: 「A moment, please, everyone.」

LABEL: 0x4274
STRING: Tokiwa entered the room and stuck her forehead to the window.

LABEL: 0x42C2
STRING: She ground her head from side to side and eventually looked back at us.

LABEL: 0x4367
STRING: ...Her forehead was red.

LABEL: 0x4385
STRING: The fact that she had such a pretty face doubled how stupid she looked.

LABEL: 0x43DA
STRING: 「Everyone.」

LABEL: 0x43F4
STRING: 「I have an important announcement to make.」

LABEL: 0x44A3
STRING: 「I couldn't see anything.」

LABEL: 0x4554
STRING: 「Now, now. Please wait.」

LABEL: 0x457E
STRING: 「It's too early to assume that what Akari-chan saw was a shark.」

LABEL: 0x45C2
STRING: 「It could be a dolphin or a whale.」

LABEL: 0x45F2
STRING: 「I heard a voice like that yesterday, too.」

LABEL: 0x462D
STRING: ――A dolphin will forever imitate the voice of its dead partner.

LABEL: 0x466D
STRING: Just because you heard a voice didn't mean it was alive.

LABEL: 0x46A9
STRING: Even if observed, they might be dead.

LABEL: 0x46F7
STRING: But, Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x4715
STRING: It didn't matter if what Touri saw

LABEL: 0x4745
STRING: was not a shark

LABEL: 0x4767
STRING: or even a living being.

LABEL: 0x47F2
STRING: 「...I don't care who or what it was.」

LABEL: 0x4822
STRING: 「Or whether you saw it wrong or if it was really there to begin with.」

LABEL: 0x4854
STRING: 「It's already gone, and it's not going to attack us, so we'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x48B4
STRING: 「The windows of a deep-sea submarine aren't that weak.」

LABEL: 0x48E8
STRING: 「Isn't that right, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x491B
STRING: 「『YES』」

LABEL: 0x4935
STRING: 「See? So don't worry, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x4974
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x4993
STRING: She didn't look convinced.

LABEL: 0x49BB
STRING: Of course, I could understand why she wanted to believe what she saw with her own eyes.

LABEL: 0x4B08
STRING: However, what Reiri said was correct.

LABEL: 0x4B38
STRING: People's eyes are only subjective.

LABEL: 0x4B68
STRING: Not to mention, in a stressful environment like this, it's not unheard of for hallucinations to occur...

LABEL: 0x4BC8
STRING: Since the shark wasn't here right now, it didn't matter whether it was true.

LABEL: 0x4C1C
STRING: 「Even if the shark that Touri saw came back...」

LABEL: 0x4C52
STRING: 「Tokiwa will just pilot the unit and drive it away.」

LABEL: 0x4CF3
STRING: 「Right, Toki...」

LABEL: 0x4D3F
STRING: The window entered the edge of my vision.

LABEL: 0x4D5F
STRING: And on the other side...

LABEL: 0x4D75
STRING: Was a dark sea.

LABEL: 0x4D8B
STRING: My went vision went blurry.

LABEL: 0x4DA7
STRING: For a moment...

LABEL: 0x4DBB
STRING: For just a moment...

LABEL: 0x4DD5
STRING: I thought I saw something white.

LABEL: 0x4EA5
STRING: ――What was that just now?

LABEL: 0x4EC3
STRING: A hallucination.

LABEL: 0x4ED7
STRING: I was just seeing things.

LABEL: 0x4EEF
STRING: A misunderstanding.

LABEL: 0x4F05
STRING: I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x4F1F
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x4F35
STRING: What I saw...

LABEL: 0x4F53
STRING: What I caught a glimpse of...

LABEL: 0x4F79
STRING: It was a familiar white color.

LABEL: 0x51B8
STRING: That was...

LABEL: 0x51D0
STRING: I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x51EA
STRING: I did know.

LABEL: 0x5206
STRING: What it really was.

LABEL: 0x521E
STRING: What had drifted outside the window.

LABEL: 0x545D
STRING: No, that was wrong.

LABEL: 0x5477
STRING: I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x5491
STRING: It couldn't be.

LABEL: 0x54AB
STRING: But, it was...

LABEL: 0x54C9
STRING: Not floating.

LABEL: 0x54ED
STRING: It was...

LABEL: 0x5503
STRING: Being held in something's mouth.

LABEL: 0x5738
STRING: I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x5752
STRING: That wasn't it.

LABEL: 0x5766
STRING: I tried to convince myself.

LABEL: 0x5782
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x5798
STRING: There was no mistaking it.

LABEL: 0x57B8
STRING: I wasn't seeing things.

LABEL: 0x57DE
STRING: That was...

LABEL: 0x57F4
STRING: A girl's

LABEL: 0x580A
STRING: white, barely human form.

LABEL: 0x5A63
STRING: 「――Hikari!」

LABEL: 0x5ABE
STRING: 「Don't look!」

LABEL: 0x5ADD
STRING: Hiragino immediately stood in front of Yukari and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x5B17
STRING: As if to cover the window, as if to obstruct their vision.

LABEL: 0x5B47
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x5B5D
STRING: But I was sure they'd seen it, too.

LABEL: 0x5BEE
STRING: ――That face.

LABEL: 0x5C0C
STRING: The part that was her face.

LABEL: 0x5C2A
STRING: Her body, which had been dragged around.

LABEL: 0x5C4C
STRING: The lump of flesh that was her body.

LABEL: 0x5C6C
STRING: I think my eyes met her one remaining eye.

LABEL: 0x5CA8
STRING: And where it should be, there was no torso.

LABEL: 0x5CE8
STRING: The arms and legs as well.

LABEL: 0x5D02
STRING: Not there.

LABEL: 0x5D1A
STRING: Not enough――

LABEL: 0x5D34
STRING: What was there was――

LABEL: 0x5DB4
STRING: ――The presence of death.

LABEL: 0x5EA6
STRING: ――Damn it.

LABEL: 0x5EBE
STRING: The nausea welling up inside me made me collapse on the spot.

LABEL: 0x5FB2
STRING: I was assaulted by a feeling of intermittent vomiting and gradually increasing dizziness, rendering me immobile.

LABEL: 0x5FF8
STRING: I couldn't... think about anything...

LABEL: 0x601E
STRING: I couldn't move.

LABEL: 0x6048
STRING: I desperately tried to keep my fading consciousness together.

LABEL: 0x6085
STRING: 「It can't be...」

LABEL: 0x60A1
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x60C2
STRING: Yukari's hopeless voice reached my ears while I was so focused on myself that I was barely functional.

LABEL: 0x6114
STRING: As she stood there in a stupor, I crawled toward her feet.

LABEL: 0x614C
STRING: ...What was I doing?

LABEL: 0x6196
STRING: 「Why did she...?」

LABEL: 0x61BA
STRING: Have to die?

LABEL: 0x61E2
STRING: It was unreasonable!

LABEL: 0x6202
STRING: What did she ever do?

LABEL: 0x622A
STRING: Why her?

LABEL: 0x6248
STRING: I wouldn't allow it.

LABEL: 0x6260
STRING: I couldn't forgive... something like this.

LABEL: 0x6286
STRING: It shouldn't have been like this.

LABEL: 0x62AA
STRING: Wasn't that right?

LABEL: 0x62C4
STRING: Her corpse had been brutally devoured.

LABEL: 0x62EE
STRING: In an instant, it was burned into my eyes.

LABEL: 0x6312
STRING: Why, why...?

LABEL: 0x6332
STRING: But, yet, however, since...

LABEL: 0x635C
STRING: Even so...

LABEL: 0x6374
STRING: ――Was that what I was supposed to say?

LABEL: 0x6474
STRING: Unable to bear it any longer, I vomited.

LABEL: 0x6496
STRING: The splash on the floor mixed with my sweat.

LABEL: 0x64D9
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun...」

LABEL: 0x64FC
STRING: 「Stay away...!」

LABEL: 0x651A
STRING: ――It was my fault.

LABEL: 0x653A
STRING: I knew that, didn't I?

LABEL: 0x655C
STRING: I couldn't fool myself.

LABEL: 0x6578
STRING: I had to accept it.

LABEL: 0x659C
STRING: That I was the cause of everything.

LABEL: 0x65CE
STRING: Hikari died because I did something I shouldn't have.

LABEL: 0x660C
STRING: ――No.

LABEL: 0x6624
STRING: Not just her.

LABEL: 0x6644
STRING: How many people had died?

LABEL: 0x6660
STRING: How many people had I killed?

LABEL: 0x667C
STRING: Did I happen to forget about them just because I didn't know their faces or names?

LABEL: 0x66CA
STRING: Everyone who died had a name,

LABEL: 0x66F6
STRING: a life,

LABEL: 0x6710
STRING: and a future ahead of them...

LABEL: 0x6732
STRING: And that was――

LABEL: 0x67A7
STRING: 「Aaaaaahhhh!!」

LABEL: 0x67CB
STRING: I was a fool.

LABEL: 0x67E1
STRING: An utter fool.

LABEL: 0x67F9
STRING: No matter what I did, I couldn't take it back.

LABEL: 0x683B
STRING: What I did was unforgivable.

LABEL: 0x6877
STRING: I'd take as much punishment as there was.

LABEL: 0x689D
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x68B7
STRING: That was why...

LABEL: 0x68D1
STRING: Right here and now...

LABEL: 0x68E5
STRING: This was no time to be crying miserably in a place like this.

LABEL: 0x6988
STRING: I wiped my face and put strength into my legs.

LABEL: 0x6A7F
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun...」

LABEL: 0x6AA2
STRING: 「Sorry for worrying you...」

LABEL: 0x6ACA
STRING: 「...But I'm fine now.」

LABEL: 0x6AEC
STRING: The first thing I saw when I got up was Touri, who looked terribly pale.

LABEL: 0x6B2E
STRING: She trembled wordlessly as Hiragino supported her shoulders.

LABEL: 0x6B6C
STRING: I thought back to when Reiri went missing.

LABEL: 0x6BA6
STRING: It had been a whole day since I'd seen Touri like this...

LABEL: 0x6C64
STRING: 「Aaah...」

LABEL: 0x6C9E
STRING: 「We can't leave them like this!」

LABEL: 0x6D33
STRING: 「Have to save them...」

LABEL: 0x6D5E
STRING: She looked up as she spoke, but there were no tears in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x6D92
STRING: Hiragino quietly shook his head.

LABEL: 0x6DC5
STRING: 「...That's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x6E53
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x6E7C
STRING: 「It's impossible, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x6EA4
STRING: 「Can't you tell just by looking?」

LABEL: 0x6EC8
STRING: 「...She's

LABEL: 0x6EE3
STRING: already dead.」

LABEL: 0x6F63
STRING: It was a merciless declaration.

LABEL: 0x6F7F
STRING: An indisputable fact.

LABEL: 0x6F9B
STRING: He seemed to be in pain as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x6FC5
STRING: There was no way Hiragino wouldn't understand how Touri felt.

LABEL: 0x7012
STRING: 「Please, Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x7038
STRING: 「Even if she's dead,

LABEL: 0x7060
STRING: we can't leave her to the fish out there in the cold sea.」

LABEL: 0x709A
STRING: 「Don't you think that's too cruel?」

LABEL: 0x70CF
STRING: 「Even if you say that...」

LABEL: 0x7130
STRING: We had to take into account what it'd cost us to retrieve the body.

LABEL: 0x7164
STRING: We needed energy and supplies.

LABEL: 0x7190
STRING: Which meant that if we retrieved her dead body, our chances of survival would decrease accordingly.

LABEL: 0x71F0
STRING: Hiragino asked Yukari for help.

LABEL: 0x7286
STRING: 「...Momoi, you say something too.」

LABEL: 0x7324
STRING: 「...That's right.」

LABEL: 0x7344
STRING: 「I think we should retrieve her as well.」

LABEL: 0x7403
STRING: Hiragino was in disbelief at her statement.

LABEL: 0x7441
STRING: In our current situation centered on survival, how much of a burden would it be to retrieve Hikari's corpse...?

LABEL: 0x749B
STRING: What in the world was Yukari thinking?

LABEL: 0x74D6
STRING: 「...Momoi, what's going on?」

LABEL: 0x756E
STRING: 「Right now, it's difficult for us to recover all the bodies of the passengers and attendants from the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x75C8
STRING: 「However, under normal circumstances, we have a duty to retrieve the bodies.」

LABEL: 0x760E
STRING: 「It may seem capricious to save only the one who's in front of us,

LABEL: 0x7658
STRING: but not saving what can be saved goes against what justice is.」

LABEL: 0x769E
STRING: 「...Isn't that the duty of those who survive?」

LABEL: 0x773F
STRING: 「How about it, Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0x7765
STRING: 「As a doctor, you agree with that, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x780C
STRING: 「Or... Are you too used to seeing corpses by now?」

LABEL: 0x7844
STRING: 「One wrong step and it could have been us outside that window...」

LABEL: 0x788E
STRING: 「Can't you think of it that way?」

LABEL: 0x794A
STRING: 「There's no need for that, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x7977
STRING: Hiragino was at a loss after her aggressive reasoning.

LABEL: 0x79A3
STRING: He was scratching his head while chewing on a tablet.

LABEL: 0x7A41
STRING: 「I'd like to help her if I can as well.」

LABEL: 0x7A7D
STRING: 「...I'll defer to your judgment here.」

LABEL: 0x7AE8
STRING: And so, it was decided that we would retrieve Hikari's corpse.

LABEL: 0x7B24
STRING: I, too... I didn't want to leave her out in the cold sea.

LABEL: 0x7B72
STRING: I didn't expect Yukari to agree so easily, but...

LABEL: 0x7CA6
STRING: 「What's wrong, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x7CCF
STRING: Reiri looked like she wanted to say something.

LABEL: 0x7D29
STRING: She turned away without saying a word in response to Touri's question.

LABEL: 0x7E38
STRING: 「But... Even if we say we're going to save her, what are we going to do?」

LABEL: 0x7E8D
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san can use the slurp gun, right?」

LABEL: 0x7ED1
STRING: 「If so, I'm sure she'll be able to use its arms and the like.」

LABEL: 0x7F13
STRING: 「I think we can just leave it to her.」

LABEL: 0x7F54
STRING: 「Is it all right to let us in the wheelhouse?」

LABEL: 0x7FF2
STRING: 「...There's not much point in forbidding anyone from entering there at this point.」

LABEL: 0x8049
STRING: Indeed, it would be most efficient to leave it to Tokiwa, but...

LABEL: 0x8083
STRING: For some reason, something felt off.

LABEL: 0x80A3
STRING: Even if it was efficient, to think that Yukari, who valued discipline, would suggest relying on Tokiwa herself...

LABEL: 0x8169
STRING: 「Can I leave it to you, Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x81A8
STRING: 「Huh.」

LABEL: 0x8258
STRING: Tokiwa, on the other hand, was staring blankly into space.

LABEL: 0x82A8
STRING: ...Did she understand what we were asking of her?

LABEL: 0x83AD
STRING: 「In short, I just need to catch that shark-like thing.」

LABEL: 0x8450
STRING: 「That should be fine.」

LABEL: 0x846E
STRING: 「I shall turn my golden fangs against it.」

LABEL: 0x84AD
STRING: 「Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x84D8
STRING: As usual, Yukari's ability to willingly ignore things was amazing.

LABEL: 0x8518
STRING: I didn't think I was particularly good at retorting, so I wasn't confident that I wouldn't get sidetracked in a conversation with Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x85EE
STRING: 「In that case, let's get to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x8629
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x869C
STRING: 「...Let's hurry.」

LABEL: 0x86FB
STRING: She opened the door as she spoke, urging everyone on.

LABEL: 0x8729
STRING: ...I wondered what it was.

LABEL: 0x8747
STRING: As I thought, I felt like she was in a strange hurry...

LABEL: 0x8785
STRING: However, no one, including Hiragino, seemed suspicious of her.

LABEL: 0x87C5
STRING: Was I just imagining things...?

LABEL: 0x8861
STRING: 「Oh, we don't need everyone to go.」

LABEL: 0x8897
STRING: 「As long as Tokiwa-san and I go, it should be fine.」

LABEL: 0x88D3
STRING: 「The rest of you can stay here.」

LABEL: 0x89BC
STRING: 「No... Take me with you as well.」

LABEL: 0x89FB
STRING: 「I'll go too.」

LABEL: 0x8A1B
STRING: 「As the ship's doctor and the one in charge of the lives here...」

LABEL: 0x8A4F
STRING: 「You don't mind, right?」

LABEL: 0x8A80
STRING: 「...Very well.」

LABEL: 0x8AA2
STRING: 「What about you two?」

LABEL: 0x8BF4
STRING: Touri looked at Reiri beside her.

LABEL: 0x8C1A
STRING: Reiri did not move at all, as if oblivious of her gaze.

LABEL: 0x8CC8
STRING: 「...I'll stay with Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x8CF8
STRING: 「Sorry... And good luck, Tokiwa-chan.」

LABEL: 0x8D3B
STRING: 「『Roger.』」

LABEL: 0x8D62
STRING: Cold.

LABEL: 0x8D76
STRING: It was August, the height of summer, yet it was freezing cold.

LABEL: 0x8DE9
STRING: Tokiwa took the lead and left the room while showing off her biceps.

LABEL: 0x8E33
STRING: We followed after her――

LABEL: 0x8E6C
STRING: 「...He he he.」

LABEL: 0x8E8D
STRING: A guttural voice.

LABEL: 0x8EA7
STRING: It was a nasty laugh.

LABEL: 0x8F22
STRING: I turned around to see Reiri with her lips twisted.

LABEL: 0x8F52
STRING: 「...What's so funny?」

LABEL: 0x8F85
STRING: 「Just so you know...」

LABEL: 0x8FA5
STRING: 「It's just a thing.」

LABEL: 0x8FC9
STRING: 「There's no point in retrieving something like that.」

LABEL: 0x9010
STRING: 「You――」

LABEL: 0x9047
STRING: 「And it's pointless to look for <Alice> as well.」

LABEL: 0x9084
STRING: ――Again.

LABEL: 0x909E
STRING: This <Alice> again.

LABEL: 0x90BE
STRING: What in the world was she referring to?

LABEL: 0x90E6
STRING: I didn't even know if it was a person or an object. A mysterious word.

LABEL: 0x912A
STRING: So far, I had only heard Yukari mention it,

LABEL: 0x915C
STRING: so this was the first time someone other than her or ROMLES spoke about it.

LABEL: 0x9282
STRING: Yukari seemed taken aback by the word <Alice> as it left Reiri's lips.

LABEL: 0x92D0
STRING: She quickly regained her composure.

LABEL: 0x9364
STRING: 「...Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9382
STRING: 「...How do you know that?」

LABEL: 0x93B8
STRING: 「We'll talk later.」

LABEL: 0x93EB
STRING: Reiri didn't answer.

LABEL: 0x9409
STRING: She was staring at Yukari with a fearless smile on her face.

LABEL: 0x94AF
STRING: 「...Right now, we need to get her back.」

LABEL: 0x9515
STRING: 「Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x97E6
STRING: When we arrived at the wheelhouse, Tokiwa immediately rushed for the slurp gun control panel.

LABEL: 0x99FE
STRING: She was forced back without a word.

LABEL: 0x9A2E
STRING: ...Come to think of it, this place had been unlocked for a while now.

LABEL: 0x9A6C
STRING: If we didn't lock the door later, it could turn into Tokiwa's exclusive game center before we knew it.

LABEL: 0x9B56
STRING: 「...Ahem.」

LABEL: 0x9B72
STRING: 「Now, let's locate our target first.」

LABEL: 0x9BC7
STRING: Yukari regained her composure and assumed command.

LABEL: 0x9BFB
STRING: She gave instructions, and I operated the equipment.

LABEL: 0x9C3E
STRING: Tokiwa would only take the helm when the time came to catch the body.

LABEL: 0x9C7E
STRING: Just as Yukari said, finding Hikari came first...

LABEL: 0x9CC0
STRING: ...That said, it was possible that the shark-like creature from before had already gone off somewhere.

LABEL: 0x9D20
STRING: The probe unit had broken down yesterday.

LABEL: 0x9D50
STRING: So even if we wanted to find her, there was only so much we could do.

LABEL: 0x9DA0
STRING: 「For now, just use the outboard camera――」

LABEL: 0x9DD2
STRING: I was pretty sure I had seen something like that while operating the various units before...

LABEL: 0x9E2C
STRING: ...There.

LABEL: 0x9E4C
STRING: 「――Wait, what's this?」

LABEL: 0x9E74
STRING: There was something wrong with the outboard camera display.

LABEL: 0x9E9E
STRING: The number of registered camera units...

LABEL: 0x9ED2
STRING: 「Hey, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x9EF0
STRING: 「Which of these units is the outboard camera?」

LABEL: 0x9F98
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x9FB3
STRING: 「There's no way there are more than ten cameras out there...」

LABEL: 0xA065
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III> has 17 cameras positioned outside.」

LABEL: 0xA0A6
STRING: 「So, they're all connected to outboard cameras.」

LABEL: 0xA0F3
STRING: 「Seriously...?」

LABEL: 0xA12B
STRING: That was a lot.

LABEL: 0xA141
STRING: I couldn't believe it, but I still gave commands to all seventeen units at once.

LABEL: 0xA18B
STRING: An image rose to the display.

LABEL: 0xA1CB
STRING: ...Just as Yukari said, all the cameras were active.

LABEL: 0xA205
STRING: The camera feeds and locations surrounded almost the whole ship.

LABEL: 0xA25D
STRING: Now then, the room we were just in... the crew room on the second floor of the front section.

LABEL: 0xA2BB
STRING: That was strange.

LABEL: 0xA2D3
STRING: I checked the location of the room we were in earlier.

LABEL: 0xA305
STRING: As I thought... No matter how many times I checked, I wasn't wrong.

LABEL: 0xA33B
STRING: However, due to its location, that room should have no windows...

LABEL: 0xA377
STRING: I then remembered the exchange between Touri and Yukari in the observation deck.

LABEL: 0xA565
STRING: 「Due to the two-sphere structure of this ship, there are rooms where you can't see the outside, even with windows in place.」

LABEL: 0xA5D3
STRING: 「However, we have installed polymer-structured displays at the window locations even in rooms like that, with an acrylic panel between them.」

LABEL: 0xA649
STRING: 「In that way, you can enjoy the deep sea in real time through the display.」

LABEL: 0xA699
STRING: 「And... as I said, it's a display, but we're pushing its resolution to the absolute limits.」

LABEL: 0xA6F3
STRING: 「It was developed at ROMLES, and during the tests, not a single person was able to distinguish it from the real thing.」

LABEL: 0xA753
STRING: 「At this time, the rooms with such display windows are basically some of the crew rooms, but...」

LABEL: 0xA7AF
STRING: 「If you get the chance, please take a look.」

LABEL: 0xA8D0
STRING: 「I see... So what we saw through that window was a real-time image.」

LABEL: 0xA92D
STRING: 「T-That's correct.」

LABEL: 0xA954
STRING: It was so real that I had completely forgotten about it.

LABEL: 0xA99C
STRING: Yukari cleared her throat beside me.

LABEL: 0xA9C0
STRING: She'd probably forgotten about it, too.

LABEL: 0xA9EE
STRING: Was she getting a bit flustered?

LABEL: 0xAA10
STRING: ...No, that wasn't necessarily the case.

LABEL: 0xAA3A
STRING: Yukari was out of the loop pretty often...

LABEL: 0xAA74
STRING: I brought up a map of the ship on my sub-display.

LABEL: 0xAAB2
STRING: 「Yukari-san, what's the image projected on that window?」

LABEL: 0xAB6A
STRING: 「Most likely it's...」

LABEL: 0xAB88
STRING: 「Just above the pressurization room.」

LABEL: 0xABBB
STRING: 「Which means...」

LABEL: 0xABF7
STRING: I identified the cameras around the pressurization room from the map.

LABEL: 0xAC33
STRING: I put the camera feed on the display in front of me, but... nothing showed up.

LABEL: 0xAC94
STRING: 「Ooh!」

LABEL: 0xACB1
STRING: Tokiwa shouted from behind me.

LABEL: 0xAD41
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, please show number 13!」

LABEL: 0xAD78
STRING: She spoke more promptly than usual.

LABEL: 0xADC0
STRING: Drawn in by her serious tone, I did as she said and switched the display.

LABEL: 0xAE18
STRING: 「This is...」

LABEL: 0xAE43
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0xAE62
STRING: The screen changed.

LABEL: 0xAE80
STRING: A figure appeared in the dim image.

LABEL: 0xAEA6
STRING: It was a color I hadn't seen before and had an unexpected form.

LABEL: 0xAF4E
STRING: 「It's a type of sea cucumber.」

LABEL: 0xAF72
STRING: 「It's a bit strange even from a distance, but it looks more interesting if you zoom in like this.」

LABEL: 0xAFE1
STRING: 「Are you taking this seriously?」

LABEL: 0xB077
STRING: 「That's rude, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0xB09D
STRING: 「The idea is to catch the shark we're looking for by following the things I'm interested in!」

LABEL: 0xB14A
STRING: 「Number eight next, please.」

LABEL: 0xB176
STRING: I flipped the switch.

LABEL: 0xB19A
STRING: Tokiwa was really excited to see a shell on the big screen.

LABEL: 0xB238
STRING: 「This form is wonderful, full of a sense of withdrawal!」

LABEL: 0xB27F
STRING: 「When I think of how much time they've spent in this form, I...」

LABEL: 0xB328
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0xB346
STRING: 「I've never felt this way before.」

LABEL: 0xB40D
STRING: 「Oh, next is number three.」

LABEL: 0xB44B
STRING: Tokiwa threw out instructions while staring at the many small displays.

LABEL: 0xB493
STRING: I followed each and every one of them while operating the cameras.

LABEL: 0xB4CB
STRING: I called out to Yukari, who was standing beside me.

LABEL: 0xB550
STRING: 「――Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0xB56C
STRING: 「We were interrupted earlier, but...」

LABEL: 0xB5A4
STRING: 「Can you tell me the rest of what happened seven years ago?」

LABEL: 0xB650
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0xB673
STRING: She looked somewhat disappointed when I asked her that.

LABEL: 0xB723
STRING: 「Even at this stage...」

LABEL: 0xB745
STRING: 「...Are you still that worried about your sister?」

LABEL: 0xB78B
STRING: 「Right now, we have to seriously think about how we can get out of here.」

LABEL: 0xB7E9
STRING: 「If you're so fixated on the past that you can't think about escaping...」

LABEL: 0xB846
STRING: 「――You're wrong.」

LABEL: 0xB860
STRING: 「That's not what I'm asking you.」

LABEL: 0xB8B6
STRING: I'd be lying if I said I didn't care about the truth.

LABEL: 0xB8FA
STRING: I used a false name to get into the <SHEEP III> in order to find out the truth in the first place.

LABEL: 0xB957
STRING: I still wanted to know, of course.

LABEL: 0xB97D
STRING: What happened seven years ago――

LABEL: 0xB9A5
STRING: How my sister died――

LABEL: 0xB9D5
STRING: What ROMLES was hiding――

LABEL: 0xBA07
STRING: ...However.

LABEL: 0xBA21
STRING: Even if the truth was brought to light, she would never come back.

LABEL: 0xBA69
STRING: Then, what I should do now wasn't question Yukari about it.

LABEL: 0xBAB5
STRING: 「What I want to know right now isn't about my sister or what happened seven years ago...」

LABEL: 0xBB13
STRING: 「...But a way for all of us to get out of here and back to the surface.」

LABEL: 0xBB63
STRING: 「It's related to that accident... seven years ago.」

LABEL: 0xBC28
STRING: 「That's what you think at least, right, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0xBC58
STRING: 「That's why you were willing to talk, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0xBC88
STRING: 「Maybe there isn't any conclusive information or hints about how to escape...」

LABEL: 0xBCD4
STRING: 「But if there's anything of significance in there,

LABEL: 0xBD18
STRING: then we should know about it.」

LABEL: 0xBD44
STRING: 「I don't want to... let their deaths be in vain.」

LABEL: 0xBE00
STRING: ――Hikari.

LABEL: 0xBE18
STRING: A light that fell into the sea.

LABEL: 0xBE34
STRING: A dead girl.

LABEL: 0xBE4E
STRING: I remembered what she'd looked like when she was still alive.

LABEL: 0xBEDB
STRING: We met and exchanged words only for a few minutes.

LABEL: 0xBF27
STRING: I couldn't possibly know everything about her from just that exchange.

LABEL: 0xBF8B
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0xBFA1
STRING: The sister she was looking for.

LABEL: 0xBFC3
STRING: ...I didn't even know if that was Touri or not anymore.

LABEL: 0xC007
STRING: However, Hikari probably never met this "sister" she'd searched for.

LABEL: 0xC055
STRING: She lost her life because of this accident.

LABEL: 0xC0D8
STRING: This accident with the <SHEEP III> would eventually be featured in the media as well.

LABEL: 0xC123
STRING: Undoubtedly, it would be depicted as an unprecedented accident with dozens of casualties.

LABEL: 0xC17D
STRING: Just as the Titanic and Toya Maru once were.

LABEL: 0xC1C3
STRING: But the number of dead wasn't the important thing.

LABEL: 0xC1F5
STRING: Each and every one of them had a life.

LABEL: 0xC21D
STRING: And we, who were still on this ship, each had our own lives to live.

LABEL: 0xC26F
STRING: The lives that were lost, and the lives here now.

LABEL: 0xC29D
STRING: I couldn't compare the weight of the two, but still...

LABEL: 0xC2D9
STRING: I couldn't bring the dead back to life.

LABEL: 0xC311
STRING: I could only try and prevent anyone else from dying.

LABEL: 0xC34D
STRING: To that end, I would do anything.

LABEL: 0xC3D2
STRING: That was my responsibility.

LABEL: 0xC400
STRING: As the one who brought about this disaster.

LABEL: 0xC4F6
STRING: 「...Alright.」

LABEL: 0xC518
STRING: 「I apologize for doubting you, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0xC55C
STRING: 「Let's talk about what happened seven years ago later.」

LABEL: 0xC58A
STRING: 「Right now, we need to find her as soon as possible.」

LABEL: 0xC5CF
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0xC603
STRING: That said...

LABEL: 0xC623
STRING: The screens remained silent.

LABEL: 0xC649
STRING: There was no sign of the creature anywhere in the 17 cameras.

LABEL: 0xC685
STRING: I wondered if it had already left this ship and went somewhere far away...

LABEL: 0xC73B
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0xC764
STRING: 「What's up? You want the next camera?」

LABEL: 0xC7A1
STRING: 「Can't we use the radar?」

LABEL: 0xC7D2
STRING: The radar...

LABEL: 0xC7EC
STRING: Come to think of it, wouldn't the radar we used to get a handle on the terrain around the ship be usable?

LABEL: 0xC842
STRING: 「Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0xC8C8
STRING: 「It doesn't react to living things, unfortunately...」

LABEL: 0xC904
STRING: 「It simply takes into account the size... So in that case...」

LABEL: 0xC936
STRING: 「A deep-sea shark of that size...」

LABEL: 0xC96B
STRING: After some thought, Yukari looked up.

LABEL: 0xC99D
STRING: The look on her face...

LABEL: 0xCA25
STRING: 「Because of its size, the radar may be of use as well.」

LABEL: 0xCACC
STRING: 「Let's give it a try!」

LABEL: 0xCAF0
STRING: 「Well done, Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0xCB27
STRING: 「I know.」

LABEL: 0xCB52
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, let's get right to it.」

LABEL: 0xCB81
STRING: 「Sure, leave it to me.」

LABEL: 0xCC34
STRING: No sooner had I said that than I activated the radar.

LABEL: 0xCC6C
STRING: In a second, a three-dimensional image of the area centered around the <SHEEP III> appeared on the screen.

LABEL: 0xCCC5
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0xCDA9
STRING: 「What's that...?」

LABEL: 0xCDCE
STRING: Rocks lined the sea floor.

LABEL: 0xCDEC
STRING: Sitting at the center of it all was a familiar image of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xCE25
STRING: And in one area on that image...

LABEL: 0xCE3F
STRING: There was a big shadow.

LABEL: 0xCE73
STRING: An oversized shadow was clinging to the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xCEB8
STRING: 「What...?」

LABEL: 0xCFD1
STRING: A shadow was pressed up against the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xCFF8
STRING: It was probably about the size of a single passenger room in this submarine.

LABEL: 0xD042
STRING: The location was roughly around the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xD06C
STRING: In other words, the area where the hatch connected to the outside.

LABEL: 0xD0A4
STRING: A shadow above it――

LABEL: 0xD0C6
STRING: ――It couldn't be.

LABEL: 0xD0E0
STRING: A single possibility crossed my mind.

LABEL: 0xD10C
STRING: 「Yukari-san!」

LABEL: 0xD135
STRING: 「This shadow...」

LABEL: 0xD15B
STRING: 「There's no doubt about it.」

LABEL: 0xD17D
STRING: 「――It's a rescue ship!」

LABEL: 0xD1AE
STRING: 「A rescue ship?!」

LABEL: 0xD1D9
STRING: 「Seriously?」

LABEL: 0xD1F8
STRING: The wheelhouse erupted at Yukari's words.

LABEL: 0xD21C
STRING: 「They... really came.」

LABEL: 0xD244
STRING: I hadn't been fooled by Reiri's words,

LABEL: 0xD276
STRING: but somewhere along the way, I had started to doubt Yukari.

LABEL: 0xD2B4
STRING: I hadn't really believed that a rescue ship was going to come.

LABEL: 0xD2EA
STRING: I thought that we might have been abandoned...

LABEL: 0xD320
STRING: But there was no way that was true.

LABEL: 0xD348
STRING: We were... partners, after all.

LABEL: 0xD460
STRING: 「But still...」

LABEL: 0xD482
STRING: 「When did they get here?」

LABEL: 0xD4AF
STRING: Right...

LABEL: 0xD4C7
STRING: It was strange that we hadn't felt or heard anything while such a big ship had approached.

LABEL: 0xD53E
STRING: 「Oh, that's simple.」

LABEL: 0xD56F
STRING: Yukari answered Hiragino's question.

LABEL: 0xD66E
STRING: 「We were in the theater room earlier.」

LABEL: 0xD6A8
STRING: 「That room is completely soundproof, so I don't think we could've heard their approach.」

LABEL: 0xD77C
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0xD7D7
STRING: Without waiting for his reply, Yukari noisily headed for the hallway.

LABEL: 0xD817
STRING: She didn't start running, but her steps were very light.

LABEL: 0xD86E
STRING: 「Anyway, let's go meet them!」

LABEL: 0xD89A
STRING: 「To the emergency room!」

LABEL: 0xD927
STRING: Following her command, we rushed out and headed for the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xD965
STRING: The sound of hurried footsteps.

LABEL: 0xD98D
STRING: Not only Yukari and Tokiwa, but even Hiragino's footsteps sounded somewhat joyful.

LABEL: 0xD9CF
STRING: We would find the rescue team when we reached the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xDA03
STRING: These two long days would come to an end.

LABEL: 0xDA24
STRING: Once we met up with them, we'd finally be saved.

LABEL: 0xDA62
STRING: We'd be rescued――

LABEL: 0xDB38
STRING: The door was unlocked with a key.

LABEL: 0xDB64
STRING: It slid open.

LABEL: 0xDB84
STRING: What awaited us beyond was――

LABEL: 0xDC77
STRING: 「There's...

LABEL: 0xDC8A
STRING: no one here?」
